Photo courtesy of the Spencer Entomological Collection, Beaty Biodiversity Museum, UBC.](https://www.zoology.ubc.ca/entomology/main/Hymenoptera/Megachilidae/Megachile%20mendica%20(3lateral)%20.jpg){height=300} Collected in Vancouver in 1957 with no subsequent sightings (specimen in the Spencer Entomological Collection) No GBIF observations in Pacific Maritime to display.
